story_18_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Good luck, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
It looks like we’re your opponents this round.
story_18_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
You and your team have built up quite the
reputation for yourselves—defeating Gym Leaders,
Elite Four members, and other famous Trainers.
story_18_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
But I guarantee you, our team is more in sync
with each other than anyone else you’ve
faced in this tournament!
story_18_02000/2401_1001_0400_10: We’re all Trainers that explored the Unova region.
story_18_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
But not just that! We trained together on Pasio,
strengthening our bonds!
story_18_02000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Let’s give this battle everything we’ve got!
No regrets on either side!
